name: LitecoinInfo
0:
”Alexa, ask Litecoin Info for a coin summary”
”Alexa, ask Litecoin Info for the current price”
”Alexa, ask Litecoin Info for price changes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: litecoin info
des:
The skill can give you up-to-date market informations about the cryptocurrency Litecoin (LTC). The following data can be retrieved:

- current price
- price changes in the last hour
- price changes in the last 24 hours
- price changes in the last 7 days
- market cap

If the skill is used on a device featuring a display (e.g. Echo Show) additional informations will be displayed.

If there are any problems, crashes or questions please write an email to bauchschuss_deluxe@live.at !


Available commands:
==============================================

* Alexa, ask Litecoin Info for a coin summary
* Alexa, ask Litecoin Info for the current price
* Alexa, ask Litecoin Info for price changes
* Alexa, ask Litecoin Info for the market cap
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
